name: A FUNNYTRIVIANNA Quiz | Words in Words for Kids | 10 Questions

questions.text: Using only letters in "FUNNYTRIVIANNA", find a 5-letter word meaning something that is silly, or humorous.
questions.explanation:
Funny.

	If something is silly or humorous, it is often called "funny".  Sometimes, when something is funny, it makes you laugh or smile.

questions.text: Using only letters in "FUNNYTRIVIANNA", find a 3-letter word for a type of large vehicle.
questions.explanation:
Van.

	A van is a type of vehicle that often has either 3 or four doors, and 6-9 seats.  Vans are vehicles that come in all sorts of different colors and types.

questions.text: Using only letters in "FUNNYTRIVIANNA", find a 5-letter word for a locomotive.
questions.explanation:
Train.

	A train is a type of vehicle that is often called a locomotive.  They usually drive on tracks.  To train also means to teach, like when you train your dog, you might teach it a new trick.

questions.text: Using only letters in "FUNNYTRIVIANNA", find a 3-letter word for a pecan, pistachio, or cashew.
questions.explanation:
Nut.

	A nut is a type of food.  Pecans, pistachios, cashews, peanuts, walnuts, and macadamias are all kinds of nuts.  You can buy nut varieties separately, but sometimes you can buy cans of mixed nuts that have all sorts of different kinds all mixed together.

questions.text: Using only letters in "FUNNYTRIVIANNA", find a 3-letter word for something a fish has that we do not have.
questions.explanation:
Fin.

	Fishes have fins, which are parts of their body that help them move through the water.  Humans do not have fins, however.  There are a type of footwear that people use to swim, though, called "fins".

questions.text: Using only letters in "FUNNYTRIVIANNA", find a 5-letter word for someone who takes care of children while their parents are away, like a babysitter.
questions.explanation:
Nanny.

	A nanny is someone who takes care of children when their parents cannot.  Mary Poppins is a nanny, and so is Maria Von Trapp from "The Sound of Music".

questions.text: Using only letters in "FUNNYTRIVIANNA", find a 3-letter word meaning the opposite of near.
questions.explanation:
Far.

	If something is far, it is not very close.  It means that it is a great distance away.  For instance, if you cannot reach the top shelf, it might be too out of reach, or "far".

questions.text: Using only letters in "FUNNYTRIVIANNA", find a 4-letter word for water that comes from the sky.
questions.explanation:
Rain.

	Water comes from the sky in many different ways, including rain, snow, sleet, and hail.  Rain is simply water that comes down, hail is ice, snow is ice crystals, and sleet is a mixture of water and ice, making things very cold and slushy.

questions.text: Using only letters in "FUNNYTRIVIANNA", find a 3-letter word meaning to attempt.
questions.explanation:
Try.

	If you try to do something, you are attempting to do it.  For instance, if you try to win a race, you are attempting to be the very best and win first place.

questions.text: Using only letters in "FUNNYTRIVIANNA", find a 5-letter word for a type of small crown worn on the head.
questions.explanation:
Tiara.

	A tiara is a kind of crown that princesses often wear on their heads.  They are often very silvery and sparkly.
